CmdLine: set -eux; 	apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps 		bash 		gcc 		musl-dev 		openssl 		go 	; 	export 		GOROOT_BOOTSTRAP="$(go env GOROOT)" 		GOOS="$(go env GOOS)" 		GOARCH="$(go env GOARCH)" 		GOHOSTOS="$(go env GOHOSTOS)" 		GOHOSTARCH="$(go env GOHOSTARCH)" 	; 	apkArch="$(apk --print-arch)"; 	case "$apkArch" in 		armhf) export GOARM='6' ;; 		x86) export GO386='387' ;; 	esac; 		wget -O go.tgz "https://golang.org/dl/go$GOLANG_VERSION.src.tar.gz"; 	echo '81f154e69544b9fa92b1475ff5f11e64270260d46e7e36c34aafc8bc96209358 *go.tgz' | sha256sum -c -; 	tar -C /usr/local -xzf go.tgz; 	rm go.tgz; 		cd /usr/local/go/src; 	./make.bash; 		rm -rf 		/usr/local/go/pkg/bootstrap 		/usr/local/go/pkg/obj 	; 	apk del .build-deps; 	apk add git openssl; 		export PATH="/usr/local/go/bin:$PATH"; 	go version
Commands.Name: run
